title: Evan After
description: "For those readers looking for a new and exciting read, this is that book." - Tony Diaz"If you are looking for a story that is out of the ordinary, even extraordinary, then you have found it. Michael Grumley is the author you are looking for." - Penny Abernathy_____________________________________________________SOMETIMES THE DIFFERENCE BETWEEN A CURSE AND A GIFT IS IMPOSSIBLE TO SEE...UNTIL IT'S TOO LATE.Evan Nash is a good kid. But two weeks after his eighteenth birthday, his life changes forever. When strange problems from an accident drive him to seek help from a skeptical psychiatrist, the full extent of his metamorphosis begins to reveal itself.But Dr. Shannon Mayer has troubles of her own. Trying hopelessly to cope with a devastating past, one that is slowly destroying her, Mayer now finds herself with nowhere left to turn. Even worse, she soon realizes that Evan is caught in a desperate struggle of life and death.Two battles. Both are losing. Together, they must discover that even in the darkest days, when all seems lost, there always remains a glimmer of hope.
author: Michael C. Grumley
